http://localhost:9999/rest/myapp/testactor/get?key=1234&format=json

{"result": ["test"]}

how to know if appropriate result result is always a dict check on key “result” if not there is an errorcondition object with props as shown above

if no format str -> text readableÂ¶

very difficult to parse but ideal to play around with on webserver
